name: It's Just Trivia
description:
Welcome, one and all, to the game show where
It's
Just
Trivia!

Answer all the trivia questions and you might get a cash prize!

The arrows, WASD, or swiping can be used to move around. When answering trivia use left/right to move between selections and up to select.

This is a Bitsy Secret Santa made for Brandon as part of Bitsy Secret Santa 2019, with the prompt "It's Just Trivia". I hope you enjoy it Brandon!

Made in Bitsy (Adam LeDoux) with hacks: End from dialog (@mildmojo) Exit from dialog (@mildmojo) Avatar by room (Sean S. LeBlanc)
